testdata.title: Boogie's Diner
testdata.description: Boogie's Diner is a nice place for the whole family. They have tasty burgers and lovely milkshakes.

testdata.title: Treptower Park
testdata.description: One of Berlin's most beautiful Parks, nearby Spree.

testdata.title: FairyTale
testdata.description: Fairytale is a nice little enchanting bar near Volkspark Friedrichshain.
